children.title: Tighten layout
children.summary: Remove excess whitespace, prevent horizontal scroll
children.prompt: Tighten layout; remove excess whitespace and prevent horizontal scroll; preserve padding for readability.

children.title: Floating copy box
children.prompt: Make the copy box float; position fixed to left side of viewport; remains visible while scrolling.

children.title: ARIA and keyboard
children.prompt:
- Add aria-labels and roles where needed
- Ensure tab order and focus ring
- Check contrast AA at minimum

children.title: Live binding
children.prompt: Bind input values directly to output field updates; changes appear live without reloading.

children.title: Debounce
children.prompt: function debounce(fn, wait=200){ let t; return (...a)=>{ clearTimeout(t); t=setTimeout(()=>fn(...a), wait); }; }

children.title: Single combined copy
children.prompt: Generate a single combined copy box containing all sections separated by semicolons; easy to paste into Depot.

children.title: Multiple output modes
children.prompt: Allow multiple selectable output formats: Customer Summary (friendly), Engineer Notes (technical), Depot Format (semicolon).
